title: Cool For The Summer
lyrics: Tell me what you want What you like I'm a little curious, too Tell me if it's wrong If it's right I can keep a secret, can you? Got my mind on your body and your body on my mind Got a taste for the cherry, I just need to take a bite Don't tell your mother Kiss one another Die for each other We're cool for the summer Ooh ooh ooh ooh Ooh ooh ooh ooh Take me down into your paradise Don't be scared 'cause I'm your body type -ype Just something that we wanna try 'Cause you and I We're cool for the summer Tell me if I won If I did I just wanna play with you, too Even if they judge I'll do the time I just wanna have some fun with you Got my mind on your body and your body on my mind Got a taste for the cherry, I just need to take a bite Don't tell your mother Kiss one another Die for each other We're cool for the summer Ooh ooh ooh ooh Ooh ooh ooh ooh Take me down into your paradise Don't be scared 'cause I'm your body type -ype Just something that we wanna try 'Cause you and I We're cool for the summer Shh... don't tell your mother Got my mind on your body and your body on my mind Got a taste for the cherry, I just need to take a bite (Take me down) Take me down into your paradise (Don't be scared)Don't be scared 'cause I'm your body type -ype Just something that we wanna try (wanna try) 'Cause you and I (you and I) We're cool for the summer (Take me down) We're cool for the summer (Don't be scared) 'Cause I'm your body type -ype Just something that we wanna try 'Cause you and I (you and I) We're cool for the summer Ooh ooh ooh ooh Ooh ooh ooh ooh
